title: He And His Brother’s Baby Mama
itunes:title: He And His Brother’s Baby Mama
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I was married for 11 years and we had 2 daughters. The last three years of our marriage, he messed with his brother’s baby’s mother and she got pregnant. His brother has 2 sons by this woman and my husband is the godfather of both of his brother’s sons. His brother left her after he caught her in bed with another man at their house.................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
